resources.string: No internet connection\nPlease try again later

Rabbit Road is a dynamic arcade game where you control a rabbit catching carrots and coins! 
Avoid unnecessary items and collect only what brings you points.


Features: 
• Catch carrots and coins, avoid unwanted drops. 
• Personal TOP-5 leaderboard with your best results. 
• Three falling speed modes — easy, medium, and hard.


Test your reflexes, beat your own records, and become the true master of the carrot hunter world!
